activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12799
activity.text:
Restrict Future Dates in the UI:
Update the date picker component in the allergy form to set the maximum selectable date to today (e.g., maxDate = new Date()), preventing users from choosing future dates.

Implement Backend Validation:
In the API handling allergy submissions, validate that the received date is not later than today. If it is, return a 400 Bad Request with a descriptive error message.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12548
activity.text:
Hey, @aravindm4 @rithviknishad  can i work on this issue .
Approach:
Use a  plus icon beside group-level questions.
On click or selection, smoothly expand to reveal sub-questions.
Show a badge like "3 questions" to indicate depth before expansion.
Add a visual highlight (e.g., glowing border, background color, or shadow) around the active question.

ETA:14 June

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10470
activity.text:
Hello team, I would love to contribute and work for Diet Management in CARE as it matches well with my technical expertise . I have great experience working with react js, next js by making multiple projects both personal as well as for several hackathons including national level hackathon . I have worked on a similar project where patient's data  is recorded , their meal plan is recorded and tracked . The food reaches to their bed numbers by various delivery partners whose information is also stored. 
I can also include feature like notification sending whenever patient needs something or inventory gets empty and on the timings of their meal.
I am looking forward to make a user friendly , interactive website with best user experience .
Looking forward to collaborate and make things happen .
Thankyou
